mapper.select: SELECT LEVEL, C.* FROM (SELECT HIRE_COMMENT_NO, HIRE_COMMENT_CONTENT, TO_CHAR(HIRE_COMMENT_DATE, 'YYYY"년" MM"월" DD"일" HH24"시" MI"분" SS"초"') HIRE_COMMENT_WRITTEN_DATE, MEMBER_NO, MEMBER_NICKNAME, PROFILE_IMG, HIRE_PARENT_COMMENT_NO, HIRE_COMMENT_DEL_FL FROM "HIRE_COMMENT" JOIN MEMBER USING(MEMBER_NO) WHERE HIRE_NO = #{hireNo}) C WHERE (C.HIRE_COMMENT_DEL_FL = 'N' OR 0 != (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM "HIRE_COMMENT" SUB WHERE SUB.HIRE_PARENT_COMMENT_NO = C.HIRE_COMMENT_NO AND SUB.HIRE_COMMENT_DEL_FL = 'N')) START WITH C.HIRE_PARENT_COMMENT_NO IS NULL CONNECT BY PRIOR C.HIRE_COMMENT_NO = C.HIRE_PARENT_COMMENT_NO ORDER SIBLINGS BY C.HIRE_COMMENT_NO
